FAQ.label: FAQ
FAQ.description: Here are some common questions about LawAI. Can't find what you need? Just ask us directly.

card.title: Still have questions?
card.description: Our AI assistant is available 24/7. Ask any legal question and get an instant, clear answer.

q1.a: LawAI provides informational guidance based on current legislation. While it helps you understand the law, it does not replace formal legal counsel for court proceedings.

q2.q: What type of questions can I ask?
q2.a: Any legal question — from employment disputes and tenant rights to contract reviews, fines, and business compliance.

q3.q: How fast do I get an answer?
q3.a: Most questions are answered within 30 seconds. Complex questions may take slightly longer as the AI analyzes multiple legal sources.

q4.a: Absolutely. All conversations are encrypted end-to-end. We do not share, sell, or store your personal data beyond what's needed for the session.

q5.q: Does it work in my country?
q5.a: LawAI currently covers legislation for select jurisdictions. We're expanding rapidly — check our supported regions for the latest coverage.
